[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with [Greymon] or [Omnimon] in its name and 1 Tamer card with [Tai Kamiya] in its name among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck.
inheritedEffect:
[All Turns] This Digimon with [Greymon] or [Omnimon]
                            in its name gets +1000 DP.

name: Loogamon
effect:
[Digivolve] Lv.2 w/[SoC] trait: Cost 0
[When Attacking] By trashing 1 card in your hand, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less. If [SoC] trait Tamer cards are in this Digimon's digivolution cards, ＜Draw 1＞.
inheritedEffect:
[End of Attack] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has
                            1 or more memory, gain 1 memory.

name: Veemon
effect:
[Digivolve] [DemiVeemon]: Cost 0
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your other Digimon are played or digivolve, if any of them are green or have the [Free] trait, gain 1 memory.
inheritedEffect: [Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP.

name: Pulsemon
effect:
[Digivolve] [Bibimon]: Cost 0
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Pulsemon] in its text and 1 card with the [Abadin Electronics] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck.
inheritedEffect:
[All Turns] This Digimon with [Pulsemon] in its text
                            gets +1000 DP.

name: Digimon Liberator
effect:
While you have a Digimon or Tamer with the [LIBERATOR] trait, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [LIBERATOR] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. Then, you may play 1 card with the [LIBERATOR] trait and a play cost of 3 or less from your hand without paying the cost.
securityEffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects.
